components.html: Before using this form, you need to have served and notified all the people who might have an interest in this application.

Use this form to upload and send a completed application to become a property and financial affairs deputy to the Court of Protection.

You can only use this form if you have a Payment By Account (PBA) number to pay the Â£365 application fee.

If you don't have a PBA number, you'll need to [apply for a HMCTS Fee Account](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-fee-account-application-form-fee-account-customer-application-form).

You cannot use this form if you're unable to pay the application fee. You might be able to get money off by [applying for help with fees](https://www.gov.uk/get-help-with-court-fees).

## Sending your application

Follow these steps to send your application. 

### 1. Serve and notify

Serve and notify all the people who might have an interest in your application.

### 2. Name your files

Make sure you include the:

* date you're sending your completed forms (YYYY-MM-DD format)    
* person's last name
* first letter of the person's first name
* form number, like COP1

For example, 2020-03-31 - SMITH J - COP1.pdf 

### 3. Give details of those served and notified

Tell us:

- who you've served and notified, and when you did this for each person
- each person's relationship to the person who might lack mental capacity

### 4. Upload your completed application forms
